name: height
description: Height of the SVG (number interpreted as px).

name: width
description: Width of the SVG (number interpreted as px).

name: color
description: Primary color applied to the loader.

name: backgroundColor
description: Background color of the fidget spinner. Defaults to DEFAULT_COLOR.

name: ballColors
description: Array of colors for the spinner balls. Defaults to ['#fc636b', '#6a67ce', '#ffb900'].

name: ariaLabel
description: Accessible label announced to screen readers.

name: wrapperStyle
description: Inline style object applied to the wrapper element.

name: wrapperClass
description: CSS class applied to the wrapper for custom styling.

name: visible
description: When false, the loader is not rendered. Defaults to true.

name: colors
description:
Provide multiple colors to render a gradient instead of a solid color.
When 2 or more colors are supplied a gradient will be applied to the loader.

name: gradientType
description: Type of gradient (linear or radial). Defaults to linear.

name: gradientAngle
description: Angle (in degrees) applied via rotate() transform for linear gradients.
